userreviews.userReview: This Christian/Romance novel was written by an Indy author in the beginning stages of her writing career. It was self-published without a proof-reader or editor. So for all things considered, I say good job Philena. I look forward to reading more of your stories. You put your heart into your writing.

description: A profound tale of true heroism during a time of war and how one person's integrity actually outlives the words spoken. Thomas Cade wasn't just a soldier that lived and died by a code of honor. He was also a man that lived and died by his code of Christian honor. The book explores how he touched the lives of others in ways that had no end.
title: What He Left Behind (Kyler Township, #1)
